"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a22891636872333a8a0900#post_54a22891636872333a8a0900
In super time force, if you go back in time and save your past self from dying, you can use the power of the character you were using when you died. Saxton's power is to dash across the stage and hit with a flurry of punches. Rather than your character doing this, SAXTON pops out of them and does his attack.

A single stray piece of debris could wipe out all our satellites, and a single small asteroid that hasn't been found yet could wipe out all of hong kong and NASA keeps getting their budget fucked with.
